feed.title: Events organized by City of Remo
feed.subtitle: City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors. City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo. More About the City of Remo

entry.title: Cinemo Remo
entry.content:
When:
Wednesday, November 11, 2009 from 8:00 PM - 10:00 PM (PT)

Where:
Biggest Little City Club
188 California Avenue
Reno, NV

Hosted By:
City of Remo

City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors.

 City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo.

More About the City of Remo



Register for this event now at :
http://www.eventbrite.com/event/483716810/atom

Event Details:

Come support Men's Health awareness, and bring your moustache into the BLCC for our tribute to Movember: "Super Troopers" on the BLCC big screen!

We will start the movie at 8, and the BLCC has comitted to giving a portion of proceeds all month long to Movember!

entry.title: City of Mowling
entry.content:
When:
Monday, November 16, 2009 from 6:30 PM - 8:30 PM (PT)

Where:
Starlite Lanes
1201 Stardust St.
Reno, NV

Hosted By:
City of Remo

City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors.

 City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo.

More About the City of Remo



Register for this event now at :
http://www.eventbrite.com/event/483730852/atom

Event Details:

A night of Movember family fun. Bring the kids, parents, grandparents, neighbors - pretty much anyone that would enjoy hurling balls down the lanes. Is there a more perfect match than Mos and bowling? Starlite Lanes doesn't think so - come join us to prove them right!

6+ reserved lanes, proceeds from the bowling benefit Movember and even some give-aways!

entry.title: Mo Trivia
entry.content:
When:
Tuesday, November 17, 2009 from 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM (PT)

Where:
Sierra Tap House
253 W 1st Street
Reno, NV

Hosted By:
City of Remo

City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors.

 City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo.

More About the City of Remo



Register for this event now at :
http://www.eventbrite.com/event/483747903/atom

Event Details:

One night only during Movember the Sierra Tap House is going to feature the Mo during Trivia Night. Get out and test your knowledge of all things moustache! 

Don't forget to order the Movember special while you're there.

More About the City of Remo

Join SOAK Lounge and City of Remo for a night we like to call: Man-I-Cure. Manicures, cocktails, Mos, music, and more.

entry.title: Hats and Jackets (and Mos)
entry.content:
When:
Wednesday, November 25, 2009 from 8:00 PM - 11:00 PM (PT)

Where:
Biggest Little City Club
188 California Avenue
Reno, NV

Hosted By:
City of Remo

City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors.

 City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo.

More About the City of Remo



Register for this event now at :
http://www.eventbrite.com/event/483778996/atom

Event Details:

A special night during Movember where we can pretend that our Mos make us look sophisticated, educated, better. A hat and a jacket add just the right amount of class to any Mo - try it - you'll like it.

Get out of the house and begin the final week of Movember festivities. It'll all be over soon ...

entry.title: Virginia City Field Trip
entry.content:
When:
Friday, November 27, 2009 from 11:00 AM - 5:00 PM (PT)

Where:
Virginia City
Virginia City, NV

Hosted By:
City of Remo

City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors.

 City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo.

More About the City of Remo



Register for this event now at :
http://www.eventbrite.com/event/483870269/atom

Event Details:

The one and only City of Remo tradition. The Second Annual Mo Field Trip to VC. We take sepia-toned photos, dine on sub-standard food, wander around, drink whatever they put in front of us, eat hot dogs from both ends - absolute CHAOS!

Seriously. The Mos are going to make these photos. 

You have to make it to this one.

entry.title: THE STACHE BASH - City of Remo 2009
entry.content:
When:
Saturday, November 28, 2009 at 8:00 PM - Sunday, November 29, 2009 at 12:00 AM (PT)

Where:
Sierra Tap House
253 W 1st Street
Reno, NV

Hosted By:
City of Remo

City of Remo is a local moustache growing team of men (Mo Bros), and the women (Mo Sistas) who support them, dedicated to tackling men's health issues during the annual Movember charity event by growing their mos and raising awareness throughout Reno, Nevada with the help of their City of Remo Sponsors.

 City of Reno + Mo = City of Remo.

More About the City of Remo



Register for this event now at :
http://stachebash-atom.eventbrite.com

Event Details:

The end of Movember. Our time to shine! All month long we have been growing these things on our faces, or helping someone we love/like/hate grow these things, OR we have been supporting the terrific cause that is Movember.

Now we get to party! This is the biggie - the Big Mo! Awards, prizes, celebrity judges, crazy drinks, music, pictures, glitz, glamor, red carpet, sashes, staches and more!

NO MO NO ENTRY. If you cannot grow one, one will be provided for you!

NOTE: This is the same Stache Bash that Sierra Tap House has arranged (http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=178719080554&ref=ts) - this is a cross-post to help get the word out. So, get the word out.
